title: H is for Hawk - development of claim

content.question: In the second and third paragraphs, the author discusses invisibility as a strategy for

choices.label: observing the hawk quietly to identify what it needs
calming the hawk’s fears by providing a constant supply of food
building the hawk’s confidence by leaving it alone to mark its territory
focusing the hawk by directing its attention away from the trainer

content.answer: focusing the hawk by directing its attention away from the trainer

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
